short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and view prediction markets for ArXiv papers on Manifold Markets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and view prediction markets for ArXiv papers on Manifold Markets. On the arxiv.org page, find a corresponding prediction market for the paper to bet or create a new one, so you can officially bet on the later success of a paper and you can flex later about foreseeing the good stuff, hence providing an incentive for people to actually recommend the good stuff. F
